explanations.explanation: Profile slug 'krishna' matched movies where director/writer/producer is 'Krishna Vamsi' (different person). Single-word searchTerm 'krishna' caused over-inclusion. Field: profile_matching. Sources: profile API, user report. Confidence: 95%.

No disambiguation rule for 'Krishna' (actor) vs 'Krishna Vamsi' (director) in name-disambiguation.json. Similar to Chiranjeevi vs Chiranjeevi Sarja handling. Field: name_disambiguation. Sources: lib/utils/name-disambiguation.json, app/api/profile/[slug]/route.ts. Confidence: 90%.

data.summary: Found 2 validation issues (1 high, 1 medium severity). Overall health needs review.
